Translation.API Key: API Key (:red[Required, must be applied from the LLM provider's backend])
Translation.Account ID: Account ID (Obtained from the URL of the Cloudflare dashboard)
Translation.Background Music Volume: Background Music Volume (0.2 represents 20%, background sound should not be too loud)
Translation.Clip Duration: Maximum Clip Duration (Seconds) (**Not the total length of the video**, refers to the length of each **composite segment**)
Translation.Custom: Custom Position (70, represents 70% from the top)
Translation.Custom Background Music File: Please enter the file path of the custom background music
Translation.Enable Subtitles: Enable Subtitles (If unchecked, the following settings will not take effect)
Translation.Generate Video Keywords: Click to use AI to generate **Video Keywords** based on the **script**
Translation.Generate Video Script and Keywords: Click to use AI to generate **Video Script** and **Video Keywords** based on the **subject**
Translation.Generating Video Keywords: AI is generating the video keywords...
Translation.Generating Video Script and Keywords: AI is generating the video script and keywords...
Translation.Get Help:
One-stop AI video commentary + automated editing tool🎉🎉🎉

For any questions or suggestions, you can join the **community channel** for help or discussion: https://github.com/linyqh/NarratoAI/wiki
Translation.Model Name: Model Name (:blue[Confirm the authorized model name from the LLM provider's backend])
Translation.Pixabay API Key: Pixabay API Key ([Click to Get](https://pixabay.com/api/docs/#api_search_videos)) :red[Optional, if Pexels is unavailable, then choose Pixabay]
Translation.Please Enter the Video Subject: Please enter the video script first
Translation.Plot Description: Plot Description (:blue[Can be obtained from https://www.tvmao.com/])
Translation.Script Language: Language of the generated video script (Usually, AI automatically outputs according to the language of the input subject)
Translation.Speech Key: API Key (:red[Required, either Key 1 or Key 2 is acceptable [Click to Get](https://portal.azure.com/#view/Microsoft_Azure_ProjectOxford/CognitiveServicesHub/~/SpeechServices)])
Translation.Speech Synthesis: Speech Synthesis Voice (:red[**Keep consistent with the script language**. Note: V2 version performs better, but requires an API KEY])
Translation.Video File: Video File (:blue[1️⃣Supports uploading video files (limit 2G) 2️⃣For large files, it is recommended to directly import them into the ./resource/videos directory])
Translation.Video Keywords: Video Keywords (:blue[Long videos work better in conjunction with plot descriptions.])
Translation.Video Script: Video Script (:blue[①Optional, use AI to generate ②Proper punctuation helps in generating subtitles])
Translation.Video Script and Subject Cannot Both Be: Video Subject and Video Script cannot both be empty
Translation.Video Subject: Video Subject (Given a keyword, :red[AI auto-generates] video script)
Translation.Voice Example: This is a sample text for testing voice synthesis
Translation.You can download the generated video fro: You can download the generated video from the following links
